data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Mont Fleuri, Seychelles.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mont Fleuri, Seychelles

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Mont Fleuri, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Mont Fleuri, Seychelles.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 243 believers in Mont Fleuri, Seychelles to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 243 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Mont Fleuri, Seychelles.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mont Fleuri, Seychelles has a population of 3,500.

We estimate Mont Fleuri has 243 people who might know Jesus, 3,123 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 134 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Mont Fleuri, Seychelles to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
